share on x jun 9 at 11:04 pm garden of serenity bouquet was purchased for the family of elizabeth marie "perry" disher. share on x more memories... military graveside service. jun 15. 1:30 pm east tennessee state veteran's cemetery2200 e. gov. john sevier highway. knoxville, tn, us, 37920. get order flowers now for elizabeth's military graveside service no medias to show. 365 days of grief support. subscribe farrar funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
